item.title: Review of Github Projects
item.description: Github Projects vs Trello I didn’t hear about Github Projects until recently. Projects was designed to help teams organize their work and implement their own workflow directly within Github. The goal was to make it flexible and customizable so it could be useful for any workflow, team, or project, and to make it a part of Github so developers wouldn’t need a new tool to install and configure and so they wouldn’t have to leave Github.
